SceneDescription.name: Music Room - 1F
SceneDescription.description: Leaping over the piano, you descend upon your mortal nemesis, raining blows with absolute precision. Bratticus falls in a heap, the blowtorch shutting off and landing at his side.

action.description: Assassin: [I'm already short on time. I'm not risking bloodstains on the carpet.]
Assassin: [As much as I would love to use this foul beast's small intestines as a jump rope, there's no way I'll be able to get away with it. I'm an assassin, not a miracle worker.]
